item.title: Secure and Low-latency SSH Connection: Setting Up via Tailscale
item.description: Introduction In our interconnected digital age, it’s crucial to access our devices securely from any location. This guide will walk you through setting up a VPN with Tailscale, facilitating a seamless and secure connection between an Ubuntu desktop (acting as the server) and a MacBook. For those in a hurry, jump straight to the instructions. If you’re curious, here are some Q&As: What is SSH? How does SSH help us develop remotely?
